Text: Hi, somebody asked me to post complete Hellboy and BPRD on h33t.com, where I hang out. I haven't been able to get to it but now you've posted this (and previous torrent) here. Would you consider cross posting these 2 at h33t.com? It's a good comic site these days and not only my requester but others would appreciate it. And you get more potential seeders! :-)
Sure.  I'm having some issues with internet access at the moment, but I'll try and get these over to h33t in the next few days.
